types.description: Fetch plants Flower-Power data via HTTP

in_ports.description: Fetch plants data via HTTP. Username and password must be provided before otherwise an error packet will be sent.
in_ports.name: GET

in_ports.description: Username to be used to get plants information. It must be previously registered at Parrot site or app.
in_ports.name: USERNAME

in_ports.description: Password for username to be used to get plants information.
in_ports.name: PASSWORD

types.name: flower-power/http-get

out_ports.description: Packet with measures (sunlight, temperature, soil moisture and fertilizer) and thresholds related to a plant.
out_ports.name: OUT

out_ports.description: Packet with sensor information, as battery level and battery's end of life date.
out_ports.name: DEVICE_INFO

types.description: Parse Flower-Power packets splitting into each measure.

in_ports.description: Packet with measures (sunlight, temperature, soil moisture and fertilizer) and thresholds related to a plant.
in_ports.name: IN

types.name: flower-power/get-value

out_ports.description: Plant identification, also known as location identifier.
out_ports.name: ID

out_ports.description: Plant's fertilizer level in mS/cm. The typical range for fertilizer in horticultural applications is 0 to 4 mS/cm. Generally, fertilizer < 1 is low, fertilizer in the range of 1 - 3 is a good range, above 3 is high, and above 4 may to too high. Fertilizer usage and sensitivity is plant specific.
out_ports.name: FERTILIZER

out_ports.description: Plant's fertilizer minimum threshold.
out_ports.name: FERTILIZER_MIN

out_ports.description: Plant's fertilizer maximum threshold.
out_ports.name: FERTILIZER_MAX

out_ports.description: Plant's sunlight level in Daily Light Integral (DLI) - mole x m-2 x d-1.
out_ports.name: LIGHT

out_ports.description: Plant's sunlight minimum threshold.
out_ports.name: LIGHT_MIN

out_ports.description: Plant's sunlight maximum threshold.
out_ports.name: LIGHT_MAX

out_ports.description: Air temperature around the plant in Kelvin. The range of temperature that is generally comfortable for most plants is between 283-305K.
out_ports.name: KELVIN

out_ports.description: Minimum threshold for air temperature around the plant(in Kelvin).
out_ports.name: KELVIN_MIN

out_ports.description: Maximum threshold for air temperature around the plant(in Kelvin).
out_ports.name: KELVIN_MAX

out_ports.description: Timestamp of sensors reading.
out_ports.name: TIMESTAMP

out_ports.description: Plant's water lever (soil moisture) in a range from 0 to 50%. The typical soil moisture range is between 8 (very dry) to 45 (saturated). The soil moisture will read 0 when in air. Generally, most plants require watering when the soil moisture is in the range of 12 to 18. If the soil moisture stays > 40 for too long, this may be harmful to some plants
out_ports.name: WATER

out_ports.description: Plant's water minimum threshold.
out_ports.name: WATER_MIN

out_ports.description: Plant's water maximum threshold.
out_ports.name: WATER_MAX

types.description: Filter Flower-Power packets, forwarding only packets that matches a specific plant ID.

in_ports.description: Packet with measures (sunlight, temperature, soil moisture and fertilizer) and thresholds related to a plant.
in_ports.name: IN

in_ports.description: Plant identification, also known as location identifier. Overwrite previous ID or ID set via options.
in_ports.name: ID

types.name: flower-power/filter-id

out_ports.description: Packet with measures (sunlight, temperature, soil moisture and fertilizer) and thresholds related to the plant specified by options ID.
out_ports.name: OUT

types.description: Parse Flower-Power sensor packets splitting into each measure.

in_ports.description: Packet with sensor information, as battery level and battery's end of life date related to a sensor.
in_ports.name: IN

types.name: flower-power/get-sensor-value

out_ports.description: Sensor identification, also known as sensor serial.
out_ports.name: ID

out_ports.description: Battery level (percent).
out_ports.name: BATTERY_LEVEL

out_ports.description: Timestamp of estimated battery end of life.
out_ports.name: BATTERY_END_OF_LIFE

out_ports.description: Timestamp of sensors reading.
out_ports.name: TIMESTAMP

types.description: Filter Flower-Power device information packets, forwarding only packets that matches a specific sensor ID.

in_ports.description: Packet with sensor information, as battery level and battery's end of life date.
in_ports.name: IN

in_ports.description: Sensor identification, also known as sensor serial. Overwrite previous ID or ID set via options.
in_ports.name: ID

types.name: flower-power/filter-sensor-id

out_ports.description: Packet with sensor information, as battery level and battery's end of life date related to the sensor specified by options ID.
out_ports.name: OUT
